00005 extern float unpredMemOpThreshold;

00008         //char* hi = new char[10];

00010

00012             printf("ERROR: Cannot open file(s).\n");
00013             exit(1);
00014         }

00016 }

00018 void dot::runDot(List<instruction*>* list, int subGraphID) {
00019         _list = list;
00020         createSubGraph(subGraphID);
00021         defn();
00022         createGraph();
00023         closeBlock();
00024 }

00027 }

00029 void dot::init() {
00030         fprintf(_outFile, "digraph G {\n");
00031 }
00032 
00033 void dot::createSubGraph(int subGraphID) {
00034         fprintf(_outFile, "\n\n");
00035         fprintf(_outFile, "\tsubgraph cluster_%d {\n", subGraphID);
00036         fprintf(_outFile, "\tlabel = \"Wavefront #%d\";\n", subGraphID);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void dot::defn() {
00040         for (int i = 0; i < _list->NumElements(); i++) {
00041                 if (_list->Nth(i)->getMissrate() <= unpredMemOpThreshold) {
00042                         fprintf(_outFile, "\t\tn%llu[label=\"n%llu\"];\n",_list->Nth(i)->getInsAddr(),_list->Nth(i)->getInsAddr());
00043                 } else {
00044                         fprintf(_outFile, "\t\tn%llu[label=\"n%llu\",style=filled,fillcolor=orangered];\n",_list->Nth(i)->getInsAddr(),_list->Nth(i)->getInsAddr());
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 }
00048 
00049 void dot::closeBlock() {
00050         fprintf(_outFile, "\t}\n");
00051 }
00052 
00053 void dot::createGraph() {
00054         for (int i = 0; i < _list->NumElements(); i++) {
00055                 for (int j = 0; j < _list->Nth(i)->getNumAncestors(); j++) {
00056                         if (_list->Nth(i)->getNthAncestor(j)->getMissrate() <= unpredMemOpThreshold) {
00057                                 fprintf(_outFile, "\t\tn%llu->n%llu[label=\"%d\"];\n",_list->Nth(i)->getNthAncestor(j)->getInsAddr(),_list->Nth(i)->getInsAddr(),_list->Nth(i)->getNthAncestor(j)->getMyPathLen());
00058                         } else {
00059                                 fprintf(_outFile, "\t\tn%llu->n%llu[label=\"%d\",color=orangered];\n",_list->Nth(i)->getNthAncestor(j)->getInsAddr(),_list->Nth(i)->getInsAddr(),_list->Nth(i)->getNthAncestor(j)->getMyPathLen());
00060                         }
00061                 }
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void dot::finish() {
00066         fprintf(_outFile, "}\n");
00067         //chdir("dotFiles");
00068         //system("make");
00069         //chdir("../");
00070         fclose(_outFile);
00071 }
